product_name: Mountainsmith Modular Hauler Cooler Cube - Special Buy
long_description: A worthy add-on to the popular Mountainsmith Modular Hauler System or a great stand-alone piece, the insulated Cooler Cube keeps you ready for a picnic and tailgate party.
